short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate signatures by drawing or simply typing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate Authentic Digital Signatures Easily

Signature Generator is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to quickly create professional-looking digital signatures for signing documents electronically. Whether you prefer drawing with your mouse or typing, this extension provides a seamless way to capture your unique signature.

Key Features:

- Draw Your Signature: Use your mouse or touchscreen to draw your signature in a natural and intuitive manner, mimicking the experience of signing on paper.

- Type Your Signature: If you prefer a typed approach, simply enter your name, and the extension will convert it into an elegant digital signature.

- Preview and Customize: Before finalizing your signature, preview it and make adjustments to factors like size, color, and opacity to ensure it meets your preferences.

- Download and Use: Once you're satisfied with your digital signature, download it as an image file (PNG or JPG) and use it to sign documents, contracts, forms, and more with a single click.

- Secure and Legally Binding: Digital signatures generated by this extension are legally binding and accepted by most institutions, eliminating the need for printing, scanning, and faxing.

Streamline your document workflow and embrace the convenience of electronic signatures with Signature Generator. Say goodbye to the hassle of printing and scanning, and sign your important documents effortlessly from any device with this user-friendly Chrome extension.
